code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DateRangePicker=_ref=>{let{onStartDateChange,onEndDateChange}=_ref;const[startDate,setStartDate]=useState('2023-01-01');const[endDate,setEndDate]=useState('2024-01-01');const handleStartDateChange=e=>{const newStartDate=e.target.value;setStartDate(newStartDate);onStartDateChange(newStartDate);};const handleEndDateChange=e=>{const newEndDate=e.target.value;setEndDate(newEndDate);onEndDateChange(newEndDate);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',gap:'5px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:startDate,onChange:handleStartDateChange,style:{padding:'8px',borderRadius:'4px',border:'1px solid #ccc'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:endDate,onChange:handleEndDateChange,style:{padding:'8px',borderRadius:'4px',border:'1px solid #ccc'}})]});};export default DateRangePicker;
